item.title: Lost in cyberspace
item.description:
Lost in cyberspace

Be suspicious of unsolicited emails

Pop quiz time. Who was the first African in space?

item.title: Apple smacks down FBI backdoor
item.description:
Apple smacks down FBI backdoor

Kudos to Apple and its CEO, Tim Cook, for standing firm on US government pressure to build a 'backdoor" to its iOS devices.  As this excellent article by my mate Hadlee Simons shows,  leaving a key under the mat for the ' good guys' leaves your house (iPhone or iPad) open for all the bad guys too.

item.title: MWC 2016: what to expect from the world's biggest mobile tech show - AndroidPIT
item.description:
MWC 2016: what to expect from the world's biggest mobile tech show - AndroidPIT

Mobile World Congress in Barcelona is the world's biggest trade show devoted exclusively to mobile tech and this year Geekbeard will be there!
